data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Pod::<Target> seems to be applicable to a POD converter module, in
    the tradition of Pod::Text etc.

    In fact, Pod::PerlPoint is a subclass of Pod::Simple, but this
    might change (as it did from version 0.01 to 0.02 - version 0.01 was
    a subclass of Pod::Parser). More, Pod::PerlPoint seemed to be most
    intuitive to users.
